name: Firewall Operator
description:
As a newly-installed Firewall, you must prove that you're worthy to defend the network. Block bad incoming requests and help good ones get through. Aim for an efficiency rating of 100%!

Controls
A/D or 🡠/🡢 - Move
SPACE - Fire

Credits
Design, Programming - Caleb "Luicel" Clifton
Brick Textures - "Tileable Brick Wall" by Game-Ready Studios (on the Unity Asset Store)
Created with Unity 2019.4.19f1
